title: React
content: This website was created using NextJS and React.

title: C++
content: I have created a GUI application using C++ and Qt frameworks.

title: Python
content: I have made a fully-functional GUI application using Python.

title: HTML
content: I have constructed a wide variety of HTML-based websites for personal projects as well as the Global Career Accelerator.

title: CSS
content: I am familiar with CSS and can use it to create visually appealing websites, capable of running well even on low-end mobile hardware.

title: Bootstrap-CSS
content: I am able to use Bootstrap-CSS to make mobile-first websites that look and feel excellent on all screens, from small phones to large televisions.

title: Linux
content: I am familiar with Linux from heavy personal usage, and can effectively troubleshoot and work with it.

title: Qt
content: I use Qt to develop helpful lightweight applications for the desktop Linux ecosystem.

title: 3D Printing
content: I am familiar with the process of 3d printing, from brainstorming the design to making the final print.

title: Teamwork
content: I work very well in small teams. I fulfill my role and help encourage others to do the same.

title: CAD Software
content: I can design and create 3d models using CAD software such as AutoDesk TinkerCAD.
